frontmatter.title: How It Works
frontmatter.subTitle: You can start by following the basic steps provided bellow.

stepList.heading: Create task lists
stepList.description: List down all the task you want to accomplished using the Built-in Task List.

stepList.heading: Choose a task item
stepList.description: Choose a task item to be accomplished first and put it on the top of your priority list.

stepList.heading: Start to focus on work
stepList.description: Stay focus and work on the task until the Pomodoro ends.

stepList.heading: Take a short break
stepList.description: Do something else relaxing (i.e., not work-related). Your brain will thank you later.

stepList.heading: Repeat the process
stepList.description: Start again. Just repeat the process until you become comfortable of it.

stepList.heading: Take a long break
stepList.description: After your fourth session take a longer break and come back completely refreshed.
